title: The Water cycle
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Ron Bowie and Philip McDonald
brief_description: Illustrates how water is artificially trapped for power generation as well as a water supply for domestic, rural and industrial purposes. Dangers of pollution are emphasised, particularly the discharge of raw sewage into rivers and the sea.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Ron Bowie and Philip McDonald
description: Illustrates how water is artificially trapped for power generation as well as a water supply for domestic, rural and industrial purposes. Dangers of pollution are emphasised, particularly the discharge of raw sewage into rivers and the sea.
